document.discussion_title: One person hurt in motorcycle crash - Story | OurQuadCities
document.topic_text:
One person hurt in motorcycle crash By Ashley Richmond | Published 08/21 2016 09:43PM Updated 08/21 2016 09:43PM Copyright 2016 Nexstar Broadcasting, Inc. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed. One person was taken to the hospital after a motorcycle crash in Davenport Sunday. Police were called to River Drive and McClellan Boulevard around 4:30 p.m. The motorcycle driver was hospitalized, but police tell us they do not believe the person's injuries are life-threatening. No word on the person's current condition.
Copyright 2016 Nexstar Broadcasting, Inc. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed.
